description:
Philadelphia has a crime problem. However, it’s unclear if the city will soon pretend to care about that, as three people were shot in Center City last night and we have yet to hear about it. But with how things are going, it’s not likely that the city will do anything to crack down on lawlessness.

While the city does nothing that is significant to tackle real issues, they have decided to set the Guinness World Record for the largest drag story time event because that’s how pathetic they are.
title: Watch: City Shatters World Record For (Sigh) Largest Drag Story Hour

description:
A video went viral after a man called into Zoom court while driving with a suspended license. Subsequently, the man was ordered to turn himself in to authorities after the judge was baffled as to why he would do that. However, it turns out his license was actually supposed to be reinstated over two years ago and he is yet another victim of government employee incompetence, aka a “clerical error.”

'It's very embarrassing' says man who went viral for driving during court www.youtube.com
title: That dude who zoomed into court while driving with a suspended license? Turns out the court made a mistake...

description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

Even though it’s deranged to imply that children have a sexual orientation, a pride event in Lynnwood, Washington has still decided to include a "kids catwalk," for toddlers as young as two. And of course, this is tax-payer funded because these crazy people think this provides a public good. However, it's unclear if the alleged public benefit is supposedly for the toddlers or the adults judging their "catwalk."
title: Taxpayer-funded Pride event to feature KIDS' catwalk where adults rate toddlers on how well they work it

description:
One day, the alphabet mob woke up and declared that June would be dedicated to affirming their sexual preferences with parades, merchandise, and all things anti-straight. And just like how they stole the rainbow, this was not up for discussion. But what begs the question is that if we are to have an entire month dedicated to insignificant preferences, why are they so exclusive to the majority of the population? Why is the month so blatantly bigoted towards straight people?

Well, one bar in Idaho is fighting this anti-straight movement by declaring June “Heterosexual Awesomeness Month”.

BREAKING: A bar in Idaho, Old State Saloon, in Eagle, near Boise, is celebrating ‘Heterosexual Awesomeness
title: Idaho Bar Declares June "Heterosexual Awesomeness Month," Defies Woke Haters With A Month Of Celebrations

title: Watch: Campus Jihad and The Dark Money Behind The Hamas Protests

description: Students across America are occupying college campuses to protest for a free Palestine, divestment from Israel, and other demands, but is this a genuine grassroots movement or is this an astroturfed operation organized by NGOs and international terrorists? How did these students come to care so suddenly and exclusively about this one issue nationwide? We followed the money. Here’s what we found.
title: Campus Jihad: The Dark Money Behind the Hamas Protests

But if you don't celebrate or change your corporate logo, you might be labeled a [solve for x]-phobe.
